title: IS_FIRST_IN_ITERATION
description: Returns TRUE if the current record is the first one encountered with the specified combination of expression values during the current iteration. Typically used in the Scope Filters.

parameters.name: â€¦ expressions
parameters.description: One or more expressions combined to determine if this is the first occurrence in the source data iteration.

examples:
IS_FIRST_IN_ITERATION(AccountId, ProductCode)
-- Returns TRUE for the first AccountId + ProductCode combination and FALSE for subsequent duplicates.
